record.dc:title: Pi Beta Phi Scrapbook
record.dc:creator: Pi Beta Phi Fraternity
record.dc:description: This scrapbook, which was assembled between 1919 and 1925, is currently housed in the archives of the Pi Beta Phi National Headquarters in St. Louis, Missouri. The book contains twenty-seven images, and was likely sent to Pi Beta Phi Alumnae Clubs as a means of soliciting material support for the fraternity's Gatlinburg Settlement School.
